title: Comcast.net: Can not connect to the IMAP server Any Ideas

creator: markleskovyansky

title: Individual attachment size sendable by SMTP via Thunderbird
content: I often forward spam emails to the Anti-Phishing Working Group (APWG) in my fight against phishing. I always do so in attachment format, as APWG requests. However, if any individual attachment spam exceeds about 150K (give or take a few K's), the whole message gets rejected due to a (very) old SMTP (RFC2821) protocol limiting line length (998 relevant characters) within the message as measured by carriage return/line feed (CRLF). I think the rule is delineated as 4.5.3.1 within RFC. I can still forward such messages as attachments via Gmail, and I believe Yahoo, but not if I use Thunderbird as a suite to send. Is this a deficiency on Thunderbird's part, a bug, or something they intentionally have in place? And is there a workaround-?
creator: veryproicelandic

title: How do I delete from server after N days yet keep forever locally while using IMAP?
content:
I would like to keep using imap (because directory synchronization and such) instead of pop, yet I also want to configure thunderbird to delete (expunge) emails from the server after a certain number of days while keeping them intact offline. The reason for this is that I want to keep an offline only archive because it is more secure.

I currently only see options to delete everywhere after N days or delete locally after N days, but I want to keep local and delete from the server. It looks like the server software my email provider uses doesn't have a setting for it either, so doing this in thunderbird is my best chance of getting ut done.
creator: nielsl

title: Our Community is here to help
content:
If the community is "here to help" then why make it so difficult to ask for help?

At this point, I've been fighting this website for, oh, about 10 minutes. And I still am not at the point where I can ask a simple question on the message board.

I mean, really, why does Mozilla seem to want to distance itself for the users who have donate to it?
creator: mike.543

title: Why Thunderbird is updating to SUPERNOVA itself, ignoring disabled updates!
content:
Hello all!

Me and my colleagues are using Thunderbird already 5-6 years. We are very happy with it!

Until Supernova ... It was like a jam full of "flavors" ... however ... All my colleagues use it ( I don't know how?, in my opinion they just don't give a ****, or exist on other planet ) ... except me and one other person.

ON QUESTION !

So on 1st PC updates are disabled in Registry via "DisableAppUpdate" and there are no signs of this Supernova! On 2nd PC is just like this, but on 22.03 thunderbird updated itself! Steps that I made are these :

1. Deleted compatibility.ini 2. Downgraded to 102.15 3. Created distribution folder with policies.json (will copy text below the post) got them from : https://mozilla.github.io/policy-templates/ 4. Renamed updater.exe 5. Created more registry entries /// "AppAutoUpdate"- 0, ExtentionUpdate - 0 6. Uninstalled maintenance.exe

After all this thunderbird is working just fine. I restarted PC several times, made a shutdown - all OK. Until the next morning. And every morning I just added more settings I founded in internet until I ended here. Today is day 4. And same again ...

Please for some help.

Best Regards,
creator: hitmn

title: unwanted deletion of e-mails
content:
When I select an e-mail and click delete in the top panel sometimes not only the selected item is deleted, but also the one under the selected item. It means, that important mails dissappear. I have no idea how to prevent this neither how or what I did. It seems that somehow Thunderbird selects more than the selected item. I enclose two screenprints:

  • Selected item to delete in inbox with the to delete item in the inbox
  • deleted items in the map deleted, wheree you can see that also the mail beneath the selected item is deleted

This really bad, since I lose from time to time important e-mails
creator: firefox@vangelder.nl

title: Emails Appear in SPAM folder
content:
Running Thunderbird v115.9.0 (64-bit)

Recently I started to receive emails in my SPAM folder from an IMAP account. I have had this account for 10+ years and never had emails in SPAM. The setting on the actual account is set to SPAM off. Junk is turned off on Thunderbird.

Any ideas as to why this is starting to happen? Was there a change in a Thunderbird update?

TIA!

title: Unread Filter
content: I have added Unread Filter. But now I see is only Unread mails for Inbox. That's the only box has that issue. I have attached the image as to Quick filter is on and Pin is on. Even if I uncheck unread (green light is off) I do not see all my mails.
creator: dipak6

title: Set default browser for opening links in emails
content:
Hi,

TB 115.8.1 on OpenSUSE 15.5, rpm based install. KDE/Plasma.

Had to install MS EDGE, as unfortunately one urgently needed device's firmware based webserver works only very restricted with Firefox. Firefox is defined as default browser. And is used by every apps, except TB.

-> TB opens every link in MS Edge, now. Which is definitively NOT want I want :)

Found this link (German): https://www.torstenkelsch.de/blog/2022/internet/emailclients/den-webbrowser-in-thunderbird-aendern/ which descibes the as it should work way, setting file type based rules for "file type" 'http'. Or also this: https://support.mozilla.org/de/kb/hyperlinks-nachrichten-funktionieren-nicht

-> No entry exists for "http", so no settings possible.

network.protocol-handler.external-default was and is still set to TRUE

As "file type" is missing, searched and found this: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1330147 which is from 2021:

-> Checked that in fact there's no entry for "http" in my profile's "handlers.json"


As the last mentioned article is pretty old, 3 years, and archived, my questions:

-> is the missing "http" file type a bug? If so, TB in general or specific to my OpenSUSE based version? If so, I report this for OpenSUSE (only) -> If not a bug: Is editing "handlers.json" still the only way to solve this? -> As there's no entry for http, and Firefox is used by all other apps: Why/how is TB calling Edge instead?

Thanks in advance, Michael
creator: michaelof

creator: sacen

title: Thunderbird is not referencing the new SSL cert
content:
We use Thunderbird to send out emails. Recently our SSL cert was renewed and installed on our mail server. Everything is working correctly and using the correct SSL cert. Attached to this post is an image of the correct SSL cert working and displaying the correct Validity Period. When I attempt to send emails from this Thunderbird app, it is referencing the old expired SSL cert. Ive manually imported the correct SSL cert into Thunderbird and verified that it is displaying properly. But when I go to send the email, it is referencing the old expired SSL cert. Attached to this post are screenshots of the error and the old SSL cert that Thunderbird keeps referencing.

Please help!
creator: mwhite2

title: Doppelt Email
content:
Sehr geehrtes Thunderbird-Supportteam,

ich wende mich an Sie, da ich bei der Einrichtung meiner neuen E-Mail-Konten (Info@steakrestaurant-picasso.de und reservierung@steakrestaurant-picasso.de) auf ein Problem gestoßen bin.

Beim Kopieren der Mails wurden einige davon doppelt übertragen, und obwohl ich versucht habe, sie mithilfe des Add-Ons "Remove Duplicate Messages" zu löschen, konnte ich nur 26 davon entfernen. Es scheint jedoch, dass insgesamt über 1000 Duplikate vorhanden sind.

Können Sie mir bitte alternative Lösungsmöglichkeiten vorschlagen, um diese doppelten Nachrichten effizient zu entfernen?

Ich bedanke mich im Voraus für Ihre Unterstützung.

Mit freundlichen Grüßen, A. Zecca

title: Bandeja de Entrada: Participante aparece la dirección de correo de quien lo recibe, no el nombre predeterminado en "su nombre"
content: Hola, tengo un problema, dentro de Thunderbird tengo varias cuentas, unas de gmail y otras con dominio personal Cuando envio un correo de una a otra cuenta, indistintamente sea de un lado a otro, en la Bandeja de Entrada el nombre de quien lo envia es la dirección de correo de quien lo recibe. Ej.: aaa@gmail.com envía a bbb@gmail.com En Enviados de aaa@gmail.com aparece que el destinatario es bbb@gmail.com En la Bandeja de Entrada de bbb@gmail.com el Participante (quien lo envía) es bbb@gmail.com Hay que abrir el correo para ver quien lo ha enviado La configuración de cada cuenta tiene la identidad predeterminada "su nombre" correctamente Antes funcionaba correctamente ... no se que he modificado que ahora funciona mal Si recibimos correo desde fuera de Thunderbird, desde aaa@gmail.com en Bandeja de Entrada: Participantes aparece correctamente el nombre que tenemos en identidad predeterminada "su nombre" Gracias por la ayuda!!
creator: fdezruizisabel

title: Can't open attachments that I attach to emails I'm creating, but can open them when I receive emails from others.
content:
I have Thunderbird v 115.9.0 running on two PCs (one with Windows 10 the other with Windows 11). On both computers I can no longer open attachments that I attach to emails I'm creating, like I used to. So for instance, if I'm sending someone a PDF or JPG file, and I attache it and want to open the file and double check it before sending, I can't do that. Doesn't work if I right click on it and say "open" or if I double click on it. However if I save it to my Drafts folder first, then I can open the attachments. Likewise I can open the attachments from the Sent folder. And I have no problems opening these types of files when someone sends them to me.

I have Acrobat Reader Pro set to open PDFs, and Photoshop set to open JPGs, and I double checked the settings, and have re-enabled those as the default programs in T-bird's Settings/General/Files and Attachment section.

Any advice on how to fix this?

title: Multiple email folders
content: 1. I have automatic updates set for Thunderbird. Recently, it updated to 115.9.0. After this update, all but one of my multiple email folders disappeared. I have searched for days trying to find a solution. I added in two of my email folder names and manually entered the incoming and outgoing information. I now open my Thunderbird application today and all the folders are listed, including the 2 duplicates. The 2 duplicates have a different number of messages than the other 2. 2. I can not find where to be able to view the header and the message underneath. I have to click on each message to see if I want to keep it or not; then close; then delete. 2. how can I sort the email folders? This is a nightmare for me as I have more than 10 email folders to manage.
creator: gaJenny

title: Cannot Copy Text from Thunderbird 115.9.0 (64-bit)
content:
I am using Thunderbird 115.9.0 (64-bit) on Windows 11.

I am finding that I cannot copy text out of a Thunderbird window (e.g., an incoming message or a message-composition pane).

If I select text and "copy" (e.g., by context menu with right click or Edit-Copy ordinary menu), my clipboard is cleared.

If my clipboard is not clear (text copied from another application), I can paste that into a Thunderbird message-composition pane. But if I then select that same text in the Thunderbird window and then do "copy" (above), the clipboard is cleared. Pasting (into a Thunderbird window or something else, like Notepad) pastes nothing.

I have noticed this problem only in the last week or so.

title: Hyperlinks in Thunderbird messages have stopped working
content:
Hyperlinks in Thunderbird (115.9.0 64 bit) running on Ubuntu 22.04.4-LTS have quit working overnight. Too my knowledge nothing changed. I have followed all the steps in the document "Hyperlinks in messages not working" with no luck. 1) My default browser was Chrome. Changed to FireFox. No Luck. Changed back no luck. 2) Check that no application is specified for HTTP content can not be followed No Preferences option exists under the menu in my version of Thunderbird. Checked in settings found nothing matching the description. 3) Checked for incorrect preferences. Used config editor. Their is no Reset option for the settings. Found the referenced setting. Switched from True to False and then back again, hoping the might reset it. No Luck 4) Switched to Safe mode from the Help menu. No luck.

New to Linux, just set this system up 2 months ago. Migrated my Windows Thunderbird database without issue and it was working fine until this morning.

In need of suggestions. If uninstalling is going to be required, I need to be able to do it a way that does not lose my historical email records or my cardbook address book of 1000 names.

Thanks
creator: hesmith1029
